summary: Frontend Developer delivering secure Angular-based solutions for healthcare workflows, ensuring accessibility and data confidentiality.
techStack: Angular 17+, PrimeNG, Formly, RxJS, .NET API, Azure, Auth0, Playwright
experiences: Built the Immuniser Angular SPA (v17+) with PrimeNG, Formly, and RxJS to streamline clinical workflows.
Integrated Australian Immunisation Register (AIR) via Auth0-secured flows: device activation, catch-up schedules, and record retrieval.
Handled sensitive clinical data with strict confidentiality and access controls.
Improved performance and UX with lazy loading, skeleton states, and Playwright E2E; shipped via Azure DevOps pipelines.

summary: Frontend Developer for Dodo and iPrimus B2C platforms, building customer journeys and Salesforce-integrated experiences.
techStack: Angular, React, Salesforce, MuleSoft, Docker, NgRx, Redux, Azure
experiences: Delivered B2C features for Dodo and iPrimus, integrating Salesforce for customer journeys.

Enhanced UX and improved conversion rates by optimizing the multi-step sign-up process.
Maintained and expanded MyDodo self-service portal for customer account management.
Integrated Salesforce and MuleSoft REST APIs for synchronized account and order data.
Contributed to a large-scale multi-service app with robust state management (NgRx/Redux).

summary: Full-Stack Developer building scalable e-learning systems and serverless .NET APIs for education clients.
